column4: so no ideas on how to change which version of the kernel i'm using on edgy (i.e. changing from the "generic" to the "i386" version)?
uboto: i'm not trying to get better performance here - it's just that the generic kernel hard locks, and there have been posts suggesting that the i386 one doesn't...
are you saying there are no longer any architecture-specific kernels in ubuntu any more?
